name: WP Ever Import
author: Satnhue

sections.description:
-Lets you import xml or csv files to generate respective posts/pages in WordPress website.
-Preview and choose among different data sets in an xml file.
-Map fields using drag n drop.
-Supports feature Image, Categories and Tags.
-Flexibility in choosing batch size for running imports from big files.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the EverImport->Imports from the side menu in the dashboard to manage your imports.
sections.faq:
What types of files can be imported

xml and css files.

short_description: This plugin lets you import xml/csv and map the fields to generate respective posts and pages
description:
-Lets you import xml or csv files to generate respective posts/pages in WordPress website.
-Preview and choose among different data sets in an xml file.
-Map fields using drag n drop.
-Supports feature Image, Categories and Tags.
-Flexibility in choosing batch size for running imports from big files.

screenshots.caption: You can import csv or xml files. Select different data sets and preview the data.
Choose among post/page and map fields from the chosen dataset.
Flexibility in choosing batch sizes while running the import.
